config.NAME: STREAM_FORECAST_RAW
config.CONFIG: "({}) WITH (kafka_topic='{}', value_format= 'json')".format(', '.join([f"{itm['ID']} {itm['Type']}" for itm in fields]), kafka_topic)

config.NAME: STREAM_FORECAST_CONWX
config.CONFIG: "AS SELECT {} FROM STREAM_FORECAST_RAW WHERE FORECAST_TYPE = 'ConWx'".format(', '.join([itm['ID'] if not 'ARRAY' in itm['Type'] else f"EXPLODE({itm['ID']}) AS {itm['ID']}" for itm in fields]))

config.NAME: FORECAST_CONWX
config.CONFIG: "WITH (KEY_FORMAT='JSON') AS SELECT {} FROM STREAM_FORECAST_CONWX GROUP BY {} EMIT CHANGES".format(', '.join([itm['ID'] if itm['Key'] else f"LATEST_BY_OFFSET({itm['ID']}) AS {itm['ID']}" for itm in fields]), ', '.join([itm['ID'] for itm in fields if itm['Key']]))

config.NAME: STREAM_FORECAST_DMI
config.CONFIG: "AS SELECT {} FROM STREAM_FORECAST_RAW WHERE FORECAST_TYPE != 'ConWx'".format(', '.join([itm['ID'] if not 'ARRAY' in itm['Type'] else f"EXPLODE({itm['ID']}) AS {itm['ID']}" for itm in fields]))

config.NAME: FORECAST_DMI
config.CONFIG: "WITH (KEY_FORMAT='JSON') AS SELECT {} FROM STREAM_FORECAST_DMI GROUP BY {} EMIT CHANGES".format(', '.join([itm['ID'] if itm['Key'] else f"LATEST_BY_OFFSET({itm['ID']}) AS {itm['ID']}" for itm in fields]), ', '.join([itm['ID'] for itm in fields if itm['Key']]))
